title: Lingenfelter C6 Corvette Commemorative Edition Twin Turbo

posts.text:
735 hrossa Corvette

















725 Horsepower 
427 CID Intercooled Twin Turbo 

One time limited production of 25 cars

To celebrate the 25th anniversary of Lingenfelter Performance Engineering, Inc. we are producing a very special one time offering of the new C6 Corvette twin turbo. 


Vehicle Specifications:

2005 - 2006 C6 Corvette - coupe or convertible color choice of: black, victory red or yellow exterior with ebony or cashmere interior 6 Speed manual transmissionZ51 Option package: Engine oil cooler, transmission oil coolerZ51 springs, sway bars and custom built shocks Navigation system with XM Radio 

Export specification vehicles are also eligible to be included in this series 



Lingenfelter package inclusions: 

725 horsepower 427 CID C5R based engine with the new Lingenfelter GEN-2 twin intercooled twin turbo package
Lingenfelter C6 Corvette exhaust system by Corsa Performance Heavy duty dual disk clutch assembly Brembo 4 piston calipers, two piece rotors, stainless lines - front & rear with Lingenfelter logo Custom Caravaggio conelly leather seats, console cover, shifter knob/boot, e-brake knob/boot, steering wheel and duffle bagUnique body enhancements including: Lingenfelter C6 hood, Lingenfelter front spoiler, Lingenfelter side skirts and unique one piece rear fascia with Lingenfelter logo embossed - The embossed logo is only available on this special edition car Michelin Pilot Sport tires with Lingenfelter mini tub kit and 345/30/ZR19 series in the rear Lingenfelter 756 Series 19" C6 forged three piece aluminum wheels - by HRE Special seat embossing, serial numbered plaque, wheel centers, Lingenfelter brushed finished fender badgesSpecial commemorative C6 coil covers complete with the classic Lingenfelter signature
2005 - 2006 Commemorative Edition 
Corvette package price $86,995.00*
